channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚州在 CJ-赖斯入狱十几年后，罕见地撤销了对他的所有指控。原因如下
item.description:
In an extremely rare move, Pennsylvania has dropped all charges against CJ Rice after he spent more than a dozen years in prison. Here's why. https://t.co/CoKM4KrzdP

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在没有可信反对派参与的总统选举之后，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京将继续掌权
item.description:
Russia's Vladimir Putin is set to extend his grip on power after a presidential election devoid of credible opposition https://t.co/Clfz3po2BO

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 17, 2024

item.title: 以色列总理内塔尼亚胡告诉美国有线电视新闻网（CNN），参议员查克-舒默批评他的领导能力并呼吁重新选举的讲话 "完全不合适"。
item.description:
Israeli PM Netanyahu tells CNN Sen. Chuck Schumer's speech criticizing his leadership and calling for new elections was "totally inappropriate" https://t.co/ybfIbPibKV

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 17, 2024

item.title: 警方称，华盛顿特区周日早些时候发生枪击事件，造成两人死亡，五人受伤。
item.description:
Two people were killed and five others were wounded in a shooting in Washington, DC, early on Sunday, police said https://t.co/sdCyHNCZt2

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 17, 2024

item.title: 警方称，被控在宾夕法尼亚州杀害 3 人的嫌犯在新泽西州一栋住宅内设置路障后被拘留。
item.description:
Suspect accused of killing 3 people in Pennsylvania is in custody after barricading himself inside a New Jersey home, police say. https://t.co/LTrWDds1IU

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 16, 2024

item.title: 费城附近的一个乡镇发生枪击事件，造成至少三人死亡。警方要求当地居民就地避难。
item.description:
At least three people are dead after a shooting in a township near Philadelphia. Police ask locals to shelter-in-place. https://t.co/BRWVYN8V0w

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 16, 2024

item.title: 负责监督唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）"封口费 "刑事案件审判的法官同意推迟开庭时间，这进一步扰乱了特朗普的诉讼日程。
item.description:
Judge overseeing Donald Trump's criminal hush money trial has agreed to delay its start, further upending Trump's legal calendar. https://t.co/acYeS1H8mB

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 15, 2024

item.title: 前副总统迈克-彭斯（Mike Pence）说，他 "不能凭良心 "为他的前竞选伙伴、美国共和党推定提名人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）背书。
item.description:
Former Vice President Mike Pence says he "cannot in good conscience" endorse his former running mate and presumptive GOP nominee Donald Trump. https://t.co/A4yDk49RX3

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在法官对检察官内森-韦德（Nathan Wade）与地方检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）的关系做出严厉裁决后，检察官内森-韦德退出了佐治亚州起诉特朗普的案件。
item.description:
Prosecutor Nathan Wade steps down from the Georgia case against Trump after the judge's scathing ruling about his relationship with DA Fani Willis. https://t.co/nEnqnyUQ6w

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最高法院驳回德克萨斯州一所大学学生团体在校园内举办变装表演的请求，支持学校禁止表演的决定。
item.description:
Supreme Court denies a Texas college student group's request to host a drag show on campus, siding with school's decision to ban the performance. https://t.co/THe3yn5dEZ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在房地产经纪人协会同意一项可能改变美国人买卖房屋方式的重大和解协议后，6% 的房屋销售佣金将不复存在。
item.description:
The 6% commission on home sales is dead after Realtors association agrees to a seismic settlement that could change how Americans buy and sell homeshttps://t.co/OOdkO7idln

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最高法院一致裁定，在某些有限的情况下，公职人员可以在社交媒体上封杀他人
item.description:
The Supreme Court unanimously rules that public officials may block people on social media in certain limited circumstances https://t.co/ci8SuJs4MO

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 15, 2024

item.title: 法官表示，检察官法尼-威利斯可以继续负责 2020 年佐治亚州针对特朗普的干预选举案，驳回了取消她资格的请求
item.description:
DA Fani Willis can stay on the 2020 Georgia election interference case against Trump, judge says, rejecting an effort to disqualify her https://t.co/d9GvEvpZuE

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 15, 2024

item.title: 麦当劳在澳大利亚、日本、香港和英国遭遇系统故障，许多门店被迫关闭，网上订餐也被暂停。
item.description:
McDonald's has been hit by a system failure in Australia, Japan, Hong Kong and the UK, with many stores forced to close and online ordering suspendedhttps://t.co/c43cqu6Ny7

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在 2021 年密歇根州校园枪击案中，詹姆斯-克拉布里（James Crumbley）的儿子杀死了四名学生，陪审团认定他过失杀人罪成立
item.description:
Jury finds James Crumbley guilty of manslaughter after a 2021 Michigan school shooting in which his son killed four students https://t.co/TX2WCZYJZR

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: 在母亲被定罪一个月后，陪审团对密歇根校园枪手父亲过失杀人案做出判决
item.description:
Jury reaches verdict in manslaughter trial of Michigan school shooter's father a month after mother's conviction https://t.co/v5odtOQoei

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: 佛罗里达州特朗普机密文件案法官以违宪模糊性为由驳回其撤销指控的动议
item.description:
Judge in Trump's classified documents case in Florida denies his motion to dismiss charges based on unconstitutional vagueness https://t.co/CKusYUHzj9

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: 曼哈顿检察官表示，他们愿意将原定于 3 月 25 日开始的特朗普封口费审判推迟长达 30 天
item.description:
Manhattan prosecutors say they are willing to delay Trump's hush money trial, scheduled to begin March 25, for up to 30 days https://t.co/97khELf5BI

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: 特朗普前顾问彼得-纳瓦罗因蔑视国会而被定罪，法院驳回了他为避免下周入狱而提出的上诉
item.description:
A court denied former Trump adviser Peter Navarro's appeal to avoid reporting to prison next week after his contempt of Congress conviction https://t.co/SnYcYHs7re

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的 "星际飞船"（Starship）是有史以来发射的最强大火箭，它在不朽的试飞中达到了新的高度，但很可能会解体。
item.description:
SpaceX's Starship, the most powerful rocket ever launched, reaches new heights in monumental test flight before likely breaking apart, officials say https://t.co/XjxlKjpR4N

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）出席在佛罗里达州举行的一场关键听证会，他将就其囤积机密文件的指控的合法性提出质疑
item.description:
Donald Trump attends a pivotal hearing in Florida where he's challenging the legality of charges over his hoarding of classified documents https://t.co/DKYerIyyJ0

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: SpaceX 的 "星际飞船"--世界上最强大的火箭--比以往任何时候都更进一步进入试飞阶段，标志着该公司取得了重大胜利
item.description:
SpaceX's Starship, the world's most powerful rocket, makes it further into test flight than ever, marking a major win for the company https://t.co/Kgl7fL9yOc

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: 前财政部长史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）表示，他正在组建一个投资者团队，准备竞购 TikTok，并指出 "它值很多钱"。
item.description:
Former Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin says he's assembling a team of investors to make a bid to buy TikTok, noting, "it's worth a lot of money" https://t.co/tz35haKF77

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 14, 2024

item.title: 联邦法官裁定，乔-拜登总统的儿子亨特-拜登将于 6 月 3 日因涉枪指控受审。
item.description:
Hunter Biden, the son of President Joe Biden, will go on trial for gun-related charges on June 3, a federal judge has ruled https://t.co/15LRA2E17Z

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在 2021 年密歇根州校园枪击案中，一名青少年杀害了四名学生，他的父亲詹姆斯-克拉布里（James Crumbley）被判过失杀人罪，陪审团已开始审议此案。
item.description:
A jury has begun deliberations in the manslaughter trial of James Crumbley, the father of a teen who killed four students in a 2021 Michigan school shooting https://t.co/vcGiq75ud9

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州颠覆选举案法官驳回对特朗普及其同案被告的部分指控，但保留大部分起诉内容
item.description:
Judge in the Georgia election subversion case dismisses some charges against Trump and his co-defendants but leaves most of the indictment intact https://t.co/zwmL5Am0fQ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 众议院通过了一项可能导致在全国范围内禁止使用 TikTok 的法案，但该法案在参议院的前景并不明朗
item.description:
House passes a bill that could lead to a nationwide ban of TikTok, though the measure faces an uncertain future in the Senate https://t.co/CgMOiz7fWB

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 由于通货膨胀侵蚀了消费者的钱包和折扣零售商的利润，Family Dollar 和 Dollar Tree 将关闭约 1,000 家门店
item.description:
Family Dollar and Dollar Tree will close about 1,000 stores as inflation takes a bite out of consumers' wallets and discount retailers' profitshttps://t.co/G9njkLxOVm

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，特朗普获得足够的共和党总统候选人提名，将在 11 月与拜登展开复赛
item.description:
Trump secures enough delegates for the Republican nomination for president, CNN projects, setting up a rematch with Biden in November https://t.co/Usmd1OI7T4 pic.twitter.com/Xe380mJ4e3

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司称，该航班原计划在飞机部分部件爆炸当天停飞检修
item.description:
Alaska Airlines flight was scheduled to be taken out of service for maintenance the same day part of the plane blew off, the company says https://t.co/s0kETPok8d

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024
